name: Batim pre-1.4 versions and Downward fall fangame reupload

description:
im sorry if i re-uploaded some versions i downloaded from someone else, i hope this helps.

also ya, if the og creators want credits i suppose ill give ya right away

I might add more games in the future, but for now, have those C:

Also i used the level K, II and P screenshots to track the ink demon's movements, how it'll help u :)
